records.location_details: 11 migrants crossed illegally the border from Belarus to Lithuania in the area of BCU (redacted), were apprehended and returned to Belarus by Lithuanian State Border Guards.
records.location_text_raw: Lithuanian territory from Belarus in the area of BCU

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman and degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: art. 3 of the European Convention on Human Rights
Article 4 of Protocol 4 to the European Convention on Human Rights
art. 18 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 19 (2) of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights

records.context_note: On 31st March 2022, 11 migrants who had crossed illegally the border from Belarus to Lithuania were apprehended and returned to Belarus by Lithuanian State Border Guards in application of Decision No. 42 of 2 August 2021.
records.evidence_quote: On 31st March 2022, 11 migrants who had crossed illegally the border from Belarus to Lithuania were apprehended and returned to Belarus in application of Decision No. 42 of 2 August 2021
